basics.name: Mohammed Aissi
basics.label: PhD in Robotics & Autonomous Vehicles
basics.summary: Autonomous UAV and Automotive Software Specialist with over 6 years of experience. PhD researcher and field engineer in autonomous robotics, embedded systems, and UAV deployment for international missions.

work.name: Lear Corporation
work.summary: ECU development and testing for Renault-Nissan and Audi-Volkswagen projects using C, MATLAB, CAPL, CANoe, and automotive standards (AUTOSAR, ISO 26262).
highlights: Developed USM ECU using Simulink, Stateflow, and MATLAB Coder.
Tested and qualified Connectivity ECU (ConBox) using CANoe, Trace32, ODIS.
Tools: MATLAB, Jira, Confluence, SVN, Git, DOORS, Agile.

work.name: ATLAN Space
work.position: Autonomous UAVs Deployment and Integration Engineer
work.summary: Led full-stack UAV integration, mission planning, training, hardware/software setup, autopilot configuration (ArduPilot, PX4).
highlights: Embedded firmware, avionics, ground control setup.

work.name: Morocco Flying Labs
work.summary: Part-time contributor promoting drone technology for social good in Morocco. Delivered training and led development of educational UAV missions.

work.name: Graduate Project Internship
work.summary: Developed robotic and embedded components for autonomous aircraft platforms.

publications.name: Autonomous solar USV with an automated launch and recovery system for UAV
publications.summary: A solar-powered USV for autonomous UAV recovery — presented at ICECOCS 2020.

publications.name: Autonomous self-charging quadcopter with solar UGV
publications.summary: PhD student showcase on intelligent drone-UGV coordination using solar platforms.

publications.name: Fast drone obstacle detection based on MobileNet
publications.summary: MobileNet-based real-time detection system for embedded drone avoidance systems.

publications.name: UAVs: From Evolution to Simulation
publications.summary: Comprehensive review and simulation pipeline for UAV development and test.

publications.name: Deep Reinforcement Learning for Mobile Robots
publications.summary: Overview of deep RL methods applied to mobile robotics navigation and control.

publications.name: SOC Estimation for 18650 Li-Ion Batteries
publications.summary: Comparative analysis on Li-Ion battery SOC estimation using manufacturer specs.

references.name: Younes Moumen – CTO at ATLAN Space
references.reference: Mohammed is the man of the situation. His multidisciplinary skills and reliability made him an outstanding asset to our UAV missions.

references.name: Ricardo Sirdabson – Software Engineer
references.reference: Mohammed is competent, creative, and serious. He helped me understand UAV electronics and provided practical training.

projects.name: Autonomous Drone + USV Recovery System
projects.summary: Designed and validated an autonomous catamaran (USV) that performs automated UAV recovery and charging using AI-based visual recognition.
